SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: We Made Sacrifices To Win 2015 Election – Oyegun

Issah Allah, our sacrifices will yield the desired result for this country.
When they mean "sacrifice" ... they really mean paying every money they have to make sure the election favor them...

Absolutely correct.
